text: Bernt "Sump-Hugo" Andersson (5 September 1933 – 6 January 2020) was a Swedish footballer and football manager. He made 91 Allsvenskan appearance for Djurgårdens IF and scored 19 goals. He managed Halmstads BK, Vasalunds IF and Helsingborgs IF. Andersson died on 6 January 2020 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:Swedish footballers Category:Swedish football managers Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths
title: Bernt Andersson
